Assignment submission has been completed.
The examination date has not been determined. I will contact you later.

common.credit_card_on_the_next_screen: Please pay by credit card on the next screen.
common.examination_fee_note: Card payment will be made on the screen after this.
common.pledge_with_examination_entry_title: Pledges for submitting an examination application
common.pledge_with_examination_entry_note: Before applying for the admissions exam, you need to read the Important information and agree to the pledge.
common.pledge_with_examination_entry_link: Download "Important information" and "Pledges for submitting the admissions application".

pledge_with_examination_entry_list.1: I would like to apply for admission to Beyondia International School Yamata Kindergarten. I have read and understand the "Important Information" and "Admissions application". I have read and understand the "Important Information" and "agree to the pledge upon submission of the Application Form". I pledge to understand the contents thereof and to take full responsibility for my child
pledge_with_examination_entry_list.2: Regarding children and their guardians, personal portraits such as photographs and videos taken by you during their enrollment at your nursery school, as well as items created by your children, may be used by your nursery school for educational and public relations purposes (Website (not limited to Yokohama Municipal Subway Green Vision and other external notices), and if the person in question can be identified, we will promptly use or post them at the request of the guardian. You agree to such use, provided that you may opt out of such use.
pledge_with_examination_entry_list.3:
When your nursery school recommends that you consult with related organizations (including, but not limited to, community rehabilitation centers), you will pledge the following:
Promptly consult the recommended institution and report the results by the specified period.
If you are asked to submit a medical certificate, please promptly submit it to your nursery school at your own expense.
Receive childcare at related institutions according to your nursery school's instructions.
pledge_with_examination_entry_list.4:
I understand that after the child has been handed over by the staff of your nursery school, if the child continues to play in the facilities of your nursery school, it will be under the supervision and responsibility of the guardian, and I have pledged the following: Masu.
Ensure that there are no hindrances to childcare for children before handover.
Keep an eye on people to ensure they do not enter restricted areas.
Be sure to leave the park by the designated final drop-off time.
pledge_with_examination_entry_list.5: When using the bus, as a parent whose child attends Beyondia International School or kindergarten, I pledge to be careful not to disturb the neighborhood at the bus stop, and to return home promptly after getting on and off the bus.
